data.-state=path: Path to the state file to read. Defaults to "terraform.tfstate".
data.-no-color: If specified, output won't contain any color.
data.-module=name: If specified, returns the outputs for a specific module
data.-json: If specified, machine readable output will be printed in JSON format

Description:
Reads an output variable from a Terraform state file and prints
  the value. With no additional arguments, output will display all
  the outputs for the root module.  If NAME is not specified, all
  outputs are printed.
